item.title: MOJO
item.author: mojosplus@gmail.com (Sijia Luo)
item.description: Download Resume My name is Sijia Luo 罗斯嘉. My passion is story telling. Born in China, and live at Los Angeles now UCLA(University of California, Los Angeles) –Film and Television MFA, USA Beijing Film Academy 北京电影学院–Animation, CHINA Films: Animated Feature: Happy in the House (90 mins), China Credit: Script Writer/Storyboard Artist Award: 14th the Huabiao Awards 华表奖 (Chinese Oscar) –Nominated for Best Animated Feature Animated Short: Kidnap (03:55 mins)
